revision.text:
<!--도로_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Road
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요경유국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 도로명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 노선명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 노선번호명 | ontologyProperty = routeNumber }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요경유지 | ontologyProperty = city }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 총연장 | ontologyProperty = length | unit = kilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개통년 | ontologyProperty = openingDate }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|기점         = 
|종점         = 
|주요교차도로 =
-->
